me.echodev.resizer

Class Resizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.echodev.resizer.Resizer

  • public class Resizer
extends java.lang.Object
    An image resizing library for Android, which allows you to scale an image file to a smaller or bigger one while keeping the aspect ratio.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Resizer(android.content.Context context)
      The constructor to initialize Resizer instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Resizer

        public Resizer(android.content.Context context)
        The constructor to initialize Resizer instance.
        Parameters:
        context - The global application context. You can get it by getApplicationContext().

    • Method Detail

      • setTargetLength

        public Resizer setTargetLength(int targetLength)
        Set the target length of the image. You only need to specify the target length of the longer side (or either side if it's a square). Resizer will calculate the rest automatically.
        Parameters:
        targetLength - The target image length in pixel. The default value is 1080.
        Returns:
        This Resizer instance, for chained settings.

      • setQuality

        public Resizer setQuality(int quality)
        Set the image quality. The higher value, the better image quality but larger file size. PNG, which is a lossless format, will ignore the quality setting.
        Parameters:
        quality - The image quality value, ranges from 0 to 100. The default value is 80.
        Returns:
        This Resizer instance, for chained settings.

      • setOutputFormat

        public Resizer setOutputFormat(java.lang.String outputFormat)
        Set the image compression format by String.
        Parameters:
        outputFormat - The compression format. The default format is JPEG.
        Returns:
        This Resizer instance, for chained settings.

      • setOutputFormat

        public Resizer setOutputFormat(android.graphics.Bitmap.CompressFormat compressFormat)
        Set the image compression format by Bitmap.CompressFormat.
        Parameters:
        compressFormat - The compression format. The default format is JPEG.
        Returns:
        This Resizer instance, for chained settings.

      • setOutputFilename

        public Resizer setOutputFilename(java.lang.String filename)
        Set the output file name. If you don't set it, the output file will have the same name as the source file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the output file, without file extension.
        Returns:
        This Resizer instance, for chained settings.

      • setOutputDirPath

        public Resizer setOutputDirPath(java.lang.String outputDirPath)
        Set the output directory path. If this is the same as where the source image locates, the source image can be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        outputDirPath - The path of the output directory. The default path is the external files directory of your app
        Returns:
        This Resizer instance, for chained settings.

      • setSourceImage

        public Resizer setSourceImage(java.io.File sourceImage)
        Set the source image file.
        Parameters:
        sourceImage - The source image file to be resized.
        Returns:
        This Resizer instance, for chained settings.

                            throws java.io.IOException
        Get the resized image file.
        Returns:

        Throws:

      • getResizedFileAsFlowable

        public io.reactivex.Flowable<java.io.File> getResizedFileAsFlowable()
        Get the resized image file as RxJava Flowable.
        Returns:
        A Flowable that emits the resized image file or error.

        Get the resized image bitmap as RxJava Flowable.
        Returns:
        A Flowable that emits the resized image bitmap or error.
